medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began at 2:30 AM with diffuse abdominal pain, followed by multiple bouts of diarrhea that started as loose stools and progressed to more watery stools. The patient experienced chills without fever until 10 PM when a temperature of 101.1 was recorded. He experienced nausea and dry heaving without vomiting, and pain localized to the lower abdomen, particularly the right lower quadrant.
medical_history.past_medical_history: 1. Primary sclerosing cholangitis: s/p CBD excision and hepaticojejunostomy; 2. Cirrhosis secondary to PSC; 3. s/p orthotopic liver transplantation; 4. Ulcerative colitis; 5. History of alcohol abuse; 6. History of steroid-induced diabetes mellitus; 7. History of pneumothorax and hemopneumothorax; 8. s/p cholecystectomy; 9. s/p left rotator cuff surgery. 10. Chronic renal insufficiency with hyperkalemia; 11. Neutropenia.
